Package org.forgerock.openidm.config.enhanced

Class JSONEnhancedConfig

java.lang.Object
org.forgerock.openidm.config.enhanced.JSONEnhancedConfig
All Implemented Interfaces:
EnhancedConfig
public class JSONEnhancedConfig extends Object implements EnhancedConfig
A service to handle enhanced configuration, including nested lists and maps to represent JSON based structures.

    • getConfigurationAsJson

      public org.forgerock.json.JsonValue getConfigurationAsJson(org.osgi.service.component.ComponentContext compContext) throws InvalidException, InternalErrorException
      Description copied from interface: EnhancedConfig
      Gets the extended Configuration which allows for nested Maps and Lists
      Specified by:
      getConfigurationAsJson in interface EnhancedConfig
      Parameters:
      compContext - The component context with the configuration to retrieve
      Returns:
      the enhanced configuration with nested maps, list allowed
      Throws:
      InvalidException - if the configuration is invalid
      InternalErrorException - if a failure occurred in retrieving the configuration

    • getConfiguration

      public org.forgerock.json.JsonValue getConfiguration(Dictionary<String,Object> dict, org.osgi.framework.BundleContext context, String servicePid) throws InvalidException, InternalErrorException
      Description copied from interface: EnhancedConfig
      Gets the extended Configuration which allows for nested Maps and Lists
      Specified by:
      getConfiguration in interface EnhancedConfig
      Parameters:
      dict - The standard OSGi configuration properties dictionary
      context - The OSGi bundle context, used to detect other services such as for decryption
      servicePid - the service pid this configuration is for
      Returns:
      the enhanced configuration (with nested maps, list allowed), empty json if no configuration properties exist.
      Throws:
      InvalidException
      InternalErrorException

    • getConfiguration

      public org.forgerock.json.JsonValue getConfiguration(Dictionary<String,Object> dict, String servicePid, boolean decrypt) throws InvalidException, InternalErrorException
      Description copied from interface: EnhancedConfig
      Gets the extended Configuration which allows for nested Maps and Lists
      Specified by:
      getConfiguration in interface EnhancedConfig
      Parameters:
      dict - The standard OSGi configuration properties dictionary
      servicePid - the service pid this configuration is for
      decrypt - true if any encrypted values should be decrypted in the result
      Returns:
      the enhanced configuration (with nested maps, list allowed), empty json if no configuration properties exist.
      Throws:
      InvalidException
      InternalErrorException

    • getRawConfiguration

      public org.forgerock.json.JsonValue getRawConfiguration(Dictionary<String,Object> dict, String servicePid) throws InvalidException
      Description copied from interface: EnhancedConfig
      Gets the extended Configuration which allows for nested Maps and Lists. The returned configuration will *not* be decrypted, nor have properties evaluated.
      Specified by:
      getRawConfiguration in interface EnhancedConfig
      Parameters:
      dict - The standard OSGi configuration properties dictionary
      servicePid - the service pid this configuration is for
      Returns:
      the enhanced configuration (with nested maps, list allowed), empty json if no configuration properties exist.
      Throws:
      InvalidException
